website_summaries.verdict: This ottoman provides storage space and doubles as a foot rest. It's not ideal for seating, however.
pros: Comes in several designs and colors
Collapses for easy storage when not in use
cons: Arrives with a strong chemical smell that some users are not able to get rid of, even after airing it out

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! A lot sturdier than expected. I'm 340 lbs and I can sit on it no problem. They're very roomy and are a great buy for how little they cost. My cats even love crawling inside them of the lid is off haha
customer_reviews.author: JHarr

customer_reviews.title: Would probably fine as a foot rest
customer_reviews.text: I used this to hold my makeup and to sit on while I put makeup on (great for a small space vanity). However after about 2 months it has fallen apart a bit. Half the time I'll sit on it and fall into the cube because the lid is falling apart so much. And I've sat on it a few times and been stabbed by some of the staples in it. It drew blood from my fingers. Would probably fine as a foot rest, but not great for every day sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Wojcio

customer_reviews.title: This has smelled funny ever since I got it (about 2 months ago)
customer_reviews.text: This has smelled funny ever since I got it (about 2 months ago). I don't know what it smells like, but it's not a particularly pleasant smell. Also, it seems to be bigger than the spot I'd measured for it.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a foot rest under my desk at work. It is almost the same height as my desk chair, so I sometimes pull it up close to my chair and sit cross legged with my legs on the ottoman and my bottom on my chair. I wouldn't sit on it, but I think that I could rest items that aren't too heavy on it. The color is nice, it was easy to put together, and there is enough padding in the top that when I sit cross legged my ankle bone doesn't feel like it's being dug into.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny MTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great product just as everybody says
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, a lot of storage room, love that it's foldable, and it matches my sectionals perfectly. Will definitely buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Really!
customer_reviews.text: Comes flat. Pull open (gently). Put single flat pc inside and push to bottom. Make sure little tab is facing up, so you can remove if you need to 'flatten' it again. Lid fits perfect. 15x15". Perfect height. My daughter sat on it for hours one time she visited. Very sturdy,!! Can hide all my snacks so Mom doesn't 'yell'. I'm a Sr citizen but ... Convinced mom and sister to get one each. Sis and I can face each other (on chairs) and both of us can rest our legs on it. (Not 6' apart, but...)
customer_reviews.author: judyB53

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for its price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a much more expensive storage ottoman. The other ottoman lasted two years, and then caved in on itself. It even had wooden feet, which convinced me it was well made. This one is just as well made without the feet. I removed the storage items from the broken ottoman and loaded them in this one. It's just right. And if it lasts only two years, I'm still money ahead. But it seems better made than the one I hauled out to the trash this afternoon. I need to add that the fabric that covers this ottoman is exactly the same fabric that covered the one that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Reads Ceaselessly

customer_reviews.title: strong dry cleaners smell air outside for a day. Must buy youll love it after smell goes away
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup only drawback strong smell like a dry cleaner. Stinks bad chemical smell air it outside for a day before you bring it in the house. Update no smell my cat loves it better than her cat house. I use it as a end table next to a chair in my room it was cheaper plus storage. must buy
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by how Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a little ottoman to put in front of a chair in my room, so I figured I would get one that I could use for storage as well. I honestly didn't think that a foldable ottoman would be all that sturdy, but I was very wrong. It says it can hold 400 lbs. I don't weigh anywhere close to that, but I am also not a little person, and sitting on this ottoman, it easily took my weight with no problem. I like the deep charcoal shade, and it is all around a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery of a cardboard cube. With 3 clumsy, big adults, 2 lg dogs, I expected it to last for an hour. The lower cube is very sturdy by itself, assembly was a no brainers and the top is padded and well made (for the price). I use as footstool at my desk, and kept it from sliding on wood floors by putting all my writing files inside. It holds a ton of my stuff. Glad I got dk gray, cuz it does get dirty on top. It's a good value for price. Great for dorm rooms or 1st apt.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Mags

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a flat box, which was so confusing at first, but it opens up like one of those cloth storage containers and has a sturdier piece to line the bottom with. The lid is comfy for putting your feet up on. When I read that it could hold something like 400 lbs, I was skeptical, but I (being 200 lbs) hopped on it to put some lights up and it was pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this ottoman. I got it to use under my desk because having my legs hanging down while sitting for long periods makes my knees ache. Now I can alternate between my angled foot rest and this when I want to elevate my legs completely. It's really sturdy and solid, and lots of storage space inside. I might have to get more of these, they're really nice looking and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: CustomerOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Storage rest ready to go
customer_reviews.text: This handsome storage rest is assembled in less than a minute. Clear instructions are given but not necessary. The sturdy lid turns this into a piece of furniture. The container is deep so you are able to put a lot of your stuff inside. It has some weight but can easily be lifted by the average person. A good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Wrong box.
customer_reviews.text: So, this product is great. It is as advertised. I have no complaints, except when my order arrived, it was in a portable desk box and I thought that I was sent the wrong product. I actually didn’t even open the box for over 2 weeks and had planned to send it back because it was the wrong box. I ended up opening the box because I was going to donate the desk to someone else and realized at that time it was indeed the correct item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: As described, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size for smaller rooms, and storage is sufficient. Holds my 200lbs just fine sitting on it. It could be softer on top. Perk if it is on carpet is that it will not slide when you put your feet on the edge. Little hard to slide when you want it to, but I will take that over sliding out when my feet at on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS CUTE. I was really surprised when it came because it was in a flat-ish box, so I must've missed where it said that it was foldable lol. This was also pretty heavy too, the lid to the ottoman has all the weight in it. It was super easy to put together. I bought this for my office so I can put extra stuff in there like decor or anything like that and It's also a pretty good foot rest! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this storage cube for my bedroom and it is WAY better quality than I thought it would be. I would definitely buy this again and I love that the color matches what it was online. The ONLY complaint I have is, I don’t believe the weight limit it has. I have not tested it out, and don’t plan on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tokarski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This looks more expensive than it really was. I like to use it as a seat when I get ready in the mornings and it holds up! I bought another cheap one that fell apart within a few months and I am not large so I know it wasn't me! lol Nice quality and it holds quite a lot inside. I like to use mine for random blankets and throws.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, and helps with organization!
customer_reviews.text: Multi-purpose addition to my entry way. I keep this box by my front door to sit on as I put shoes on. I am a little over 200#'s and have never worried about it collapsing under me. It is attractive, so does not look out of place in the entry way. I store all my shoe care products in the box (oil, polish, brushes...). This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: brian414ers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this foot rest/storage box for use on our back patio for storage of items and also to double as a foot rest. Being diabetic I need to have my feet elevated often and this product is perfect. Soft cushion top, right height to have my feet just enough above my waist to help with blood flow. I will be ordering more of these to use for storage in other areas of the home.
customer_reviews.author: N. E. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Hard to scoot on carpet
customer_reviews.text: If you're setting this on a carpeted surface, it can be tricky to budge without it tipping over. There are no handles and grabbing it by the lid with just pop the lid off. Almost impossible to scoot around the carpet one handed. Other than that its a handy little box. Adding a little handle to this would make it ideal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks but it's a pretty dang good little ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Looks quite nice. Adults can sit on it, so it's rather remarkably stable for a piece of fold-it-yourself furniture. At $20 it's a very good deal; I'd still be happy if I'd paid half again as much. Its only drawback is the repulsive chemical-stink coming from inside the ottoman. No amount of soapy scrubbing and airing it out seems to have any effect on the chemical-stink, but you can only smell it when the ottoman's lid is removed, and the stink doesn't seem to be absorbed into the clothes and books stored inside.
customer_reviews.author: Doug in Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: 165lbs. No problem to stand on!! Good storage, very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: jill williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage cubes and shoe bench!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cube bins! I ordered three of of ottoman cubes and the matching shoe bench. Very pleased with the purchases! So easy to assemble, sturdy to sit on, and appealing in appearance. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Swiger

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for under my desk to prop up my feet on occasion. The internal storage is an added bonus. It seems to be decently made and supports the weight of my feet/legs without any concerns.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Grey cube, using as footstool at home workstation
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in super sturdy cardboard packaging and arrived much faster than listed, exactly what I was looking for. Is an unusual smell, so it will need to air out, but overall recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it as a footrest, a seat, and a side table for holding beverages. Works exactly like it should. I don't store anything in it or fold it up, but it is nice I have the option to if I want to in the future. Might buy as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Perfect size for what I need it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Perfect size for what I need it for. I have several placed, strategically, around the house to help my cat jump down from high places. He broke his leg when he was sma year old and has a limp. Sturdy, too. You can sit on it and use it to stand on for reaching high places.
customer_reviews.author: Josie James

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was hoping it would be a little bit smaller, but it's still pretty awesome. Easy to put together, very sturdy. I got it to correspond with the Otto & Ben 45" bench version, and I am happy to say that the colors match perfectly! Adds a certain level of sophistication to my bedroom, which was much needed.
customer_reviews.author: SpookySelf.13

customer_reviews.title: I love these so much!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my parents' house. A lot of times, we sit around the coffee table and eat while we watch TV. My Mom used to sit on a little step stool. These not only look nice in the living room, but they're also sturdy, they can hide away eye sore stuff, and are just super functional. I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Y.

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. It's nicely covered and the fabric is decent quality. It folds up easily and is very sturdy. It's a bit awkward to move around if you have it loaded with stuff. For the price and for extra storage, it's a deal. It's not a statement piece by any means but rather a practical item, smallish in size depending on relative scale to your other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: pmisun

customer_reviews.title: An unexpected surprise
customer_reviews.text: This was a very pleasant surprise. I needed a second footstool for occasional use for my new couch. Did not want to spend a lot of money. I was pretty skeptical, but the reviews were good. This little footstool is awesome. It is very sturdy. I ordered the dark charcoal gray, and it is very nice. For the price, I don't think you can do better. I wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: I love how I can stash my crochet in the box ...
customer_reviews.text: This could very well have saved my life... literally. I have low BP and propping my feet up on this has almost made my syncope disappear altogether. I love how I can stash my crochet in the box as well. It isn't just taking up space. I love it! Oh... and setup? 15 seconds tops! We were amazed. But it's sturdy enough for me to sit on at over 150lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bostic

customer_reviews.title: Double purpose storage
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and it works, I'll be honest I didn't think I could sit down and not break but it does. Double purpose, I had a small magazine collection that I want to keep safe and this works just fine. I ordered two of them, one serves as a night table next to my bed where I put my lamp and phone at night and the other one on the other side of the bed where I can sit down and read books and chill.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J. Carreno

customer_reviews.title: We loved this handy storage footstool so much we ordered 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved this handy storage footstool so much we ordered 3 more! They're the perfect height for use in front of a sofa, under the desk elevate your legs or to just sit on. In a pinch it would probably work as an extra dining seat. I've also used it as a small coffee table. They're very sturdy (product info says it'll hold 400 lbs). Can be folded up with base stored in the lid (we slid one under the sofa for occasional use) and easily folds open, drop in the bottom piece, put the top on and it's ready!
customer_reviews.author: sumnobudi

customer_reviews.title: Portable, great storage, and a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I was surprise at how much I am using this. It is sturdy and so portable. Great storage and can handle someone sitting on it with no problem. The storage part is deep and can hold everything. Very happy with this and do not hesitate recommending this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this. It's exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It's exactly what I needed. I just wanted some kind of foot rest for sitting at my desk. I've got a small blanket or two inside, but that was more like icing on the cake, I didn't really buy it for the storage. Color was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca M. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: It was really easy to set up/take down
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well. I wanted a stool for my mother to use while her broken toe was healing and we were taking a one week class with a lot of sitting. It was really easy to set up/take down. We stored an extra blanket inside in case she got cold. And it fit under a standard table and was the perfect height. Even though this item does fold out to a descent size, it was also very discreet under the table. And it fit into a large tote bag for easy travel. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: I ordered twp of these and they were great! We rented a condo for several months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered twp of these and they were great! We rented a condo for several months and the furniture they had in it didn't include any way to put your feet up and relax so we ordered these. They were exactly what we needed to make our stay more comfortable. They were so much better than what we expected for the price we paid for them. At the end of our stay, we folded them up and put them in storage for next year when we will need them again. So glad we had them.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud2

customer_reviews.title: Classy, stylish storage unit
customer_reviews.text: The Seveille Classics Fordable Storage cube is a classy and stylish way to store household goods. I've used one unit to store yarn and assorted knitting supplies. I plan to use the second unit to store my reborn doll supplies. The storage cube is covered in a gray tweed fabric with a removable lid. Inside you'll find plenty of storage to hide your stuff. You can also use this unit as a spare place to sit. I'd recommend sitting gently though. The cube is easy to put together too. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: foot rest, storage box
customer_reviews.text: very good as I can sit on (bought a cheaper model but it immediately fell apart when I sat on it) This nice and sturdy and holds a lot. Very please! Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Petals Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, nice big size and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy for the price! I bought it to hold my grandson's dress-up and halloween costumes. It's a nice big size and it holds up with my grandsons jumping over/on it! I'm a big girl and I can even sit on this and it holds up. The fabric looks great (kinda like tweed). I gave it to them at Christmas and so it's been two months....if something can hold up in my grandson's room for two months, we're doing good!!
customer_reviews.author: Lortega

customer_reviews.title: Good to put feet
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and spacious inside can fit mini blankets and grab them when needed also the cusion is not that comfortable when putting up the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Redeyejedi

customer_reviews.title: Same issue that so many were talking about, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Same issue that so many were talking about, the smell inside... used active carbon to absorb it with not too much improvement. If not, should have been a five star
customer_reviews.author: Philip X.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Set up without directions in under 5m. Seems very sturdy (using as footrest not a seat). Looks better in person than the picture! (Just opened, has a fairly strong smell, almost like treated wood, but already dissipating) will probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This came folded flat. I liked how easy it was to put it together and make it a sturdy cube. My daughter has one in her dorm room and she uses it as a step to get up on her bed and has a couple of throws inside. It has also made nice seating for people who are there visiting.
customer_reviews.author: D. Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great product. The ottoman came folded and was very easy to put together. I use this at my office under my desk so that I can utilize storage and recline more comfortably when I am working on paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Shani. w

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for dorm.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these for dorms. Perfect extra seat, storage. Keep valuables out of sight. Highly recommend. Very nice in person in grey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic design.
customer_reviews.text: Love the gray color. Has a very deep storage area. Very sturdy. Perfect size for my small apartment and is the perfect height to put my feet up. Impressed and loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Hidden Storage
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my bedroom to hold all the extra pillows and throws. However, I realized a lot of clutter had gathered on the end table in the living room. So, now I hide everything there - magazines, heating pad, shawls, etc. I was surprised how sturdy they are. I love this gray one - it feels like a tweed and is very neutral. I guess I'll be ordering another one for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nihonji1492

customer_reviews.title: A nice storage unit-chair combo!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly very sturdy and I like the fold up option. I would've preferred $17 but I am satisfied with the product. The top also has nice padding for your butt to sit on. I put most of the kids toys inside.Lastly, some of those really small "legs" so the box isn't directly on the floor would be nice and maybe handholds/holes to easily move it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good & Serves its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a couch that sits somewhat low to the ground. Good quality, looks nice. Love the handy storage. Only thing is, it is difficult to scoot on carpet. It needs little feet or sliders on it to make it easier to scoot. Otherwise, I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I love this storage cube. It is stylish and works great for what I bought it for. It was also very easy to assemble. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hm

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it at work as a foot stool because it's taller than most, yet compactable and medium sized. I love it. Feels great. I have my feet up right now and I'm ready to fall asleep. Lol
customer_reviews.author: J Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store some winter/summer clothes. Doesn’t fit a lot but works well. I don’t know if it hold lots of weight because I don’t use it to sit or stand.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I don't like is the seam running down the side--it looks like ...
customer_reviews.text: My three year old has no problems lifting the lid, and he also uses it as a seat. Its a huge improvement over the rubbermaid containers we used to use that would crack down the middle. Only thing I don't like is the seam running down the side--it looks like it will start to sag and buckle there if too much is put in the box. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable budget item
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and comfortable budget item. The tweedy fabric isn't super heavy duty, as I expect maybe three years of use out of it before my cat claws it to the point of disposal, but the price is right and it does its job (storage and seating) just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Noah D. Karchmer

customer_reviews.title: Gray box is A o'kay
customer_reviews.text: Shipped flat.Folded out into cube shape.Light weight yet strong enough to sit upon without sides bulging outwards.No fear of collaspe.Could use more padding on top.Holds my books and mags inside.Should last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Gene D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was way nicer than expected. Looks like a regular piece of furniture too. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rahn

customer_reviews.title: Does it all!
customer_reviews.text: It is strong with a nice amount of storage inside the cube. I especially like that I can use it to slide back and forth with my bookcases and movie shelves. I have arthritis and can't kneel or bend over. So I can sit on this cube and look at anything I want to take out or reshelf on lower levels. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Graff Godby

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it as an alternative chair and I’m happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: La louve

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: This footstool is everything it's advertised to be. Very sturdy as an extra seat and acommodates plus sized bodies contrary to many other competitor products. Comfortable height as a foot rest too. Does not accommodate heavy items inside as it has a soft bottem despite a protective reinforcement sleeve but it does state the weight limit. Good size to fit throw pillow or throw.
customer_reviews.author: donnaleeii

customer_reviews.title: attractive and well-made
customer_reviews.text: These storage cubes are by far the best I've ever found. They are sturdy, roomy, and the lids are a perfect fit. Buy them with confidence. I got the charcoal color and it is classy (for a toy storage cube).
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I had nothing to elevate my feet at work/keep comfortable at my office job while pregnant...and this is perfect! Sturdy and stylish, perfect height and took me less than 30 seconds to assemble. I'm planning on buying more/different colors for my house! Spacious inside for storing about 2-3 heavy blankets, sheets, whatever!
customer_reviews.author: chey

customer_reviews.title: cheap, but uncomfortable to rest my legs on
customer_reviews.text: honestly i'm going to give this ottoman 3 stars out of 5. it's not very well-padded and is quite small, so it's hard to rest my 2 feet on it while sitting back on the couch for more than 5-10 minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want anything fancy/expensive. Just functional and comfortable. This fits the bill perfectly. The storage inside is an added bonus. It took about 5 seconds to "assemble". The top is comfortable, I was worried the edged would bother my legs sitting on it, but they do not. Feels sturdy and have 300lb sitting weight limit. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzled

customer_reviews.title: Cute and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Cute ottoman, great for storage, nice looking fabric, although I wouldn't recommend sitting on it as it is made of MDF and something like a thick cardboard, and I doubt it will hold well if used as a chair. Otherwise, looks good, fits into small spaces, and serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiding shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for our summer slip on shoes and nobody knows and its a great extra seat.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe tapia

customer_reviews.title: Good product, color varies from photos
customer_reviews.text: Great little ottoman, the color was not the same as the photo though so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for under my work desk and it's going to be great. It's roomy inside if you need the storage ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and it's much nicer than you'd think for the price. I bought it for under my work desk and it's going to be great. It's roomy inside if you need the storage space. solid-feeling and just a little bit of cushion on top. It fabric seems like a good quality and it's upholstered well. I don't think you'd know if was heavy duty card board until you pick it up. I don't know how well it would hold up in a house with kids bouncing around, but it's really perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lanning

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Versatile, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces. An easy way to maximize function by combining a comfortable option to rest your feet or sit on while storing items out of site. Easy to coordinate with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Great as a footrest
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a lifesaver. I bought it to put under my desk at work to help combat feet swelling. It’s nice to be able to put my feet up, and it’s helpful storage as well. Light weight and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sari Canavan

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, strong odor.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap and functional. Strong for what it is. Biggest gripe, it smells like mdf sawdust. A strong chemical wood smell. The blankets I put in there smell like it now, need to be washed. I hope it eventually goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good footrest with built-in storage
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a footrest that is more than just wasted space. I store some crap it in and put my legs up on it. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy with this Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Great item, great price. It was exactly the size and color I was looking for. And it's always nice to have a little extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sooooo much. I bought this during the same time I bought my headboard, which was also gray, and they went perfectly together. It's super strong! I believe the weight capacity is 400lbs! So glad I bought it because, not only does it store all of my thick throw blankets (4), but also gets used as a step stool for when I have to reach the top of my closet!!! I was going to buy a separate step stool but after getting this guy I decided he's all I needed in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Perez

customer_reviews.title: Want to store your shit and make it look nice? This is your item.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well designed fits a good amount of stuff that your hoarding and makes it look like a nice foot rest or simple seat.
customer_reviews.author: spammancan

customer_reviews.title: perf for storage and other functions 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: we got 2 of these to keep beside our bed - multi functions!! we use it for storage, place to sit when tying our shoes, and a stepping stool for our dogs to get on the bed! sometimes our dogs sleep on them lol so happy we got these!!
customer_reviews.author: noel1074

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This works great for extra storage in the dorm room and it is sturdy enough for my college freshman to use it to boost himself onto the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and storage
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and storage. It has smells, after months. Thankfully the smell doesn't seem to stay on the stored items.
customer_reviews.author: Pippi

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for the money. Large storage compartment but can fold up when you don’t need it. Also stylish enough to use as furniture. I bought this for my dorm and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Richards

customer_reviews.title: Darker than it looks, but still looks good and functions well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I put it under my desk to put my feet on. I took off a star because it's a good bit darker than the picture. It's more like dark grey & black. Luckily I still love it. But had I wanted the more mid grey, I wouldn't have been happy.
customer_reviews.author: amsprich

customer_reviews.title: It looks great! Its sturdy enough to sit on
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! Its sturdy enough to sit on, although its a bit too low to do so. I wish it was taller, that way it would make a more comfortable foot rest and you could sit on it like a bench. But other than that, it does its purpose. It can store lots of blankets/towels and can be folded when not in use. Looks nice enough to place in a living room.
customer_reviews.author: coolcat

customer_reviews.title: Held up excellently for over a year now!
customer_reviews.text: So that first picture is the two I've had for over a year and they have been heavily used. I recently got a larger couch and wanted a third, so that second picture is a brand new one. I love these things so much. They're very sturdy (I weigh 246 lbs and I've sat on them many times), decent storage space, and they've held up much better than I honestly expected. I would highly recommend these to anyone who wants an ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: Steadman  Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Our pretty heavy body building friend sat on it and we got nervous it was going to collapse and break and it didn't. Before he sat on it I only used it as a side table next to my bed with a tray on top until I got an actual nightstand. Now we use it as a foot rest near the couch in the living room and keep our dog's clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough to use for Step exercise and has enough padding to sit on
customer_reviews.author: Dave.

customer_reviews.title: Storage foot rest
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use it in my RV trailer. Light weight
customer_reviews.author: John G. McDonald Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I love my gray ottoman. It is an awesome addition can my furniture to rest my feet on. There is Storage inside of it which definitely comes in handy. I always need more storage.
customer_reviews.author: Momolyn

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size, not too big and not too small
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size, not too big and not too small! Just perfect. Fits right under my desk, and it's very soft and great for resting my feet on. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: Need more
customer_reviews.text: Love this !! No nails no hardware at all, top is very very sturdy took me 3 seconds after opening the box to set up
customer_reviews.author: Heather (elevated_vibes13)

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, well-built and doubles as a footrest
customer_reviews.text: Great design. I use it to store my vinyl records and some odds and ends. I'm impressed by its size. I was bigger than I expected which is nice and it came flat-packed. Setting it up was a breeze and it is as sturdy as the manufacturer claims. I'm 210 pounds and can sit comfortably on it without worrying that it'll collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Akin

customer_reviews.title: I like this as a footrest very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a footrest very much. Small, compact, and sturdy. Only downside is that it is difficult to pick up and move since there are creases built into 2 of the sides that allow it to fold up. This makes it hard to get a grip since they naturally want to fold in on you when picking up. Not a deal breaker though. Overall happy
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe storage in entryway
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy, considering it's made of MDF. We use it in our foyer as a place to store our shoes & a spot to sit while donning or removing them. It's prettier than a traditional shoe rack because it hides the shoes, & it keeps our entryway looking neat. I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 because I think it could be made of stronger material. However, it's holding up so far. It could be used to store many other things, too, because it holds a lot. It would be pretty & functional in a living area as extra storage & seating, or with a tray as a coffee table, especially in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fabulous!!! I use it in the camper for storage and when I’m not using it I store it under the dinette. Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: christina A Bevan

customer_reviews.title: Great footrest!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to "assemble" literally just unfolds. Holds my weight with no issue, perfect height for use with my desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid I wasn't expecting such a great quality product. The color is really nice and it's very sturdy. I use it for my makeup vanity seat. This product was very affordable and when i purchase a new home i will definetly come back to buy more for the other rooms. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kocho

customer_reviews.title: Nice cool gray, and well-built
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried parking my hefty posterior on the two I bought, so I don't know how they'd fare as actual seating. They're wonderful for storage: the inside is well-finished, so they can hold even fragile snag-prone items like afghans, though I haven't used them for clothing storage. If I feel the need for a third, I'll certainly buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Ellell Bee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, this little ottoman is very sturdy! It's super easy to assemble and an amazing bargain for the price. It did have a bit of a smell when it first arrived, but it dissipated quickly. This is comfortable to sit on or as a footrest (how I usually use it) and the storage space inside is very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This little ottoman is perfect for my small living room. It’s perfect for hiding clutter, storing toys & books, using as a table for snacks, or just putting up your feet during a binge of your favorite series or movies.
customer_reviews.author: jhuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storage and a seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is solid, more solid than I was expecting after assembling. All assembly that's required is just unfolding. Very, very easy. And has a weight limit of 400 pounds! Which is plenty for what I need it for.....a seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sweeney

product_meta.title: Seville Classics 15.7" Foldable Storage Footrest Toy Box Coffee Table Ottoman, Single, Charcoal Gray
product_meta.description:
Color:Charcoal Gray| Size:Twin| Style:Cube| Pattern Name:Ottoman

Furnish your home with Seville Classics' Foldable Storage Ottoman in Charcoal Gray. Remove the cushion top to reveal a generous storage area for organizing clothes, blankets, linens, toys, remotes and more! Doubles as a plush footrest in the living room and is ideal for use as a stool in communal work spaces, dorm halls, or commercial environments like lounges. Folding design means the cube sets up in seconds and uses little space in storage. Unit is lightweight (less than 8 lbs.) and folds away easily when out of use.

 * 100% non-woven polyester in an elegant Charcoal Gray
 * Cushioned lid provides comfort and style
 * Solid MDF construction throughout with removable top
 * Easily unfolds for set-up; No tools required

Specifications
Dimensions: 15.7" W x 15.7" D x 15.7" H
Capacities: 400 lbs. on closed lid; 30 lbs. on interior bottom
Weight: 7.3 lbs.
Model #: WEB256

What’s in the Box?
1 base
1 panel
1 lid

Limited 1-Year Warranty
Seville Classics product is backed by a limited 1-year warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
feature_bullets: MODERN CUBE FOOTREST & STOOL - Modern gray synthetic fabric with a cushioned top fabric adds a touch of elegance to your living room, entryway, office, study, or dorm.
STRONG & DURABLE CONSTRUCTION - Cushioned seat lid supports up to 400 lbs. evenly distributed for use as a cozy footrest or portable fabric stool.
SECRET HIDDEN STORAGE - Pull off the cushioned seat top to reveal a large compartment for organizing clothes, blankets, linens, magazines, books, remote controls, toys, shoes and much more.
QUICK & EASY FOLDABLE SEAT - Collapsible ottoman folds away easily for storage in closets, garages, and under beds, when out of use; sets up in seconds when you need a spare chair.
DIMENSIONS - 15.7" W x 15.7" D x 15.7" H; the perfect size for use as a footrest, or as a stool for you home.
Solid sturdy MDF construction throughout with removable lid
100% non-woven polyester in elegant dark ash grey finish
Easily unfolds for set-up; No tools required
Weight capacity: 400 lbs. on the lid (when closed); 30 lbs. for the interior bottom

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,160 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
